title: Juxtapoz Magazine title and header faces
content:
If anyone recognizes this face offhand please let me know. It looks incredibly familiar so I’m going crazy trying to remember the name!

 [‹ (x) Be Bubbly 50s script - Mr Dehaviland {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821154015/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37754 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) John Lennon and Yoko Ono "War is Over!" poster - (similar to) Franklin Gothic {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821154015/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37715 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Lunbocks
